website_summaries.verdict: One of the fastest chimney starters available, but you'll pay extra to achieve this speed.
pros: This chimney makes use of a different heat vent than most, ensuring the air is drawn effectively to ignite the charcoal more quickly
Can use the vent to add fuel, such as newspaper, to further speed the process of lighting the charcoal
Uses thick galvanized steel, so it'll last
cons: More expensive than other charcoal chimneys

customer_reviews.title: Small, expensive, and lacks the dragon fan that might make it worth the price IF INCLUDED
customer_reviews.text: Rather deceiving as it does not come with the fan which supposedly would make it faster to start. It was much smaller and more expensive than the large Weber counterpart - more like the compact Weber in size. This was not evident in the photos and description. I will say the chimney was VERY well constructed. However, I returned it as I did not feel the added quality of construction was worth the difference in price. Also got 4 emails requesting this review. Rather annoying.
customer_reviews.author: mrpru

customer_reviews.title: Handle melted third time I used it. Junk
customer_reviews.text: after 2nd time I used this handle burned me and I dropped hot coals everywhere. Thankfully no fire was started. The 3rd time I used this, I had oven gloves on and realized the plastic handle had melted onto my glove. What a waste of time and money!
customer_reviews.author: Judy Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Chinese quality control did not do their job!
customer_reviews.text: Looks like a pretty nice product but the wire grate wasn't installed in China correctly the middle ear on the wire wasn't sticking through the proper hole in the chimney . Also I assumed the chimney was the same size as a weber chimney it's not! Going to try it for the first time tomorrow see if it works in conjunction with the fan as well as they say. Mine wasn't put together correctly two out of the three tabs are in the correct holes!
customer_reviews.author: Gadget

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the extra money
customer_reviews.text: Smaller capacity than others. I have the Weber with side holes (with larger capacity) and if your not using the little plastic fan the Weber with holes is much better. I can not attest to using with the fan but after reading other reviews I am not going to be going that route. Will keep for smaller batches of charcoal.
customer_reviews.author: Peter T.

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Save your money. It's not any faster than a regular chimney. And after first time using it the side seemed like it started to melt. My coals did not bur up any faster. See pictures
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Eschete

customer_reviews.title: First impressions disappoint...
customer_reviews.text: Not really happy, was excited to use this Chimney but then I received it warped where the "BBQ DRAGON" lettering is. There's also a noticible dent on it like it's been dropped. I really want to give this Chimney a try with the BBQ Dragon Fan, but this first experience makes me question the durability in the long run. Going to return, let's see if the 2nd Chimney is better 😞.
customer_reviews.author: Gianni

customer_reviews.title: Highly disappointed in materials and manufacturer
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this chimney for just over one month and it’s entirely rusted. It’s also much smaller than I had hoped. The picture shows my brand new BBQ Dragon chimney next to my 4-year old Weber chimney that has sat outside through four northern winters. I contacted BBQ Dragon and was dismissed to deal with my issues (I purchased the fan, too, and it stopped working after three uses) with the sellers, with no concern at all expressed over their faulty products. In light of their clearly shoddy materials and even shoddier attitude towards customers, I will be sure that all of my BBQ buddies are made aware to stay clear of BBQ Dragon.
customer_reviews.author: rocco14

customer_reviews.title: What a great design
customer_reviews.text: I've been waiting on the local weather to get this into use. I'm very impressed! I can't imagine why you'd buy this and not also buy the. I started using that blower early (e.g. while we still had snow) in my fireplace. Both together work astonishingly well now that I can use my grill and smoker. This Chimney of Insanity is everything that a normal chimney starter is, but the extras, like being able to use different fuels, add fuel without tipping it up, galvanized finish, and performance in wind are well worth it. It works how they say it works, and how you hope it works.
customer_reviews.author: Trailzz

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Product - Highly Recommended!
customer_reviews.text: This product worked great! The charcoal starter really held a lot of coals and the tube to insert the fire starter was a nice touch, but what really makes this product is the portable fan that you can buy that plugs right into this thing. My full chimney of coals were ready to spread in about 10 minutes. Alternatively I also hooked this fan up to my side firebox and used it to circulate the air when I added more coals to the fire. This kept my temps at a constant level and really made long cooks easier. Highly recommended by myself for backyard bbquer's and anyone who uses charcoal chimneys.
customer_reviews.author: Audiobahnguy

customer_reviews.title: Chimney of Insanity indeed
customer_reviews.text: In combination with their battery powered Fire Lighter, it fires up the coals way faster and with way less smoke. If you desire, put a grate on top and sear your steak. Just beware of the high temps, I burned the first pieces of meat as also I had too much coals in the starter. Will go now with half a load and crank up the BBQ Dragon on low too. Update Jul 13: Starter looks ugly und rusty from the outside but is holding up pretty well still. My Weber starter started to flake rust from the inside after the same time and I cannot see this happening here.
customer_reviews.author: Mauiman

customer_reviews.title: Better than my old chimney
customer_reviews.text: Lives up to the hype. I was low on newspaper, so i used a handful of wood shavings and a small piece of paper. This thing took off without a problem. I don't have their BBQ dragon, so the second time I used it I set a small fan near the port to see how much difference it makes. It had the coals flaming and ready within just a few minutes. I think I'll be looking at the dragon next, just for cordless convenience.
customer_reviews.author: randall frost

customer_reviews.title: Great for getting the BGE going! way better than weber chimney
customer_reviews.text: ok, it is a little more expensive (well double!) however it gets going super fast and you can put the starter in the tube which is super convenient! even without the BBQ Dragon device it gerts going super fast and with the dragon blowing at slow speed this is amazing! Without the chimney the egg can take 30-40 minutes to get up to 225-235 degrees and with this in less than 100 minuted from the time you begin the egg is at temp and within 15 minutes can get it up to 500+ with the dragon. Absolutely worth it if you can afford it!
customer_reviews.author: multifuel

customer_reviews.title: Neat Novelty
customer_reviews.text: It's cool, but it's tiny. They take up room at the bottom to put in the elbow for air intake and it's a little smaller to begin with, so the amount of charcoal that can be lit is less than normal. I need one and a half of these to get a decent temperature in my grill. I use the BBQ Dragon fan with this also. I'll still use the fan when lighting coals normally. Going to buy Weber chimney to use on a regular basis and only use this chimney if I need a few more coals on short notice for longer cooks.
customer_reviews.author: Civilcaveman

customer_reviews.title: It is designed to use the fan and in 10 mins coals are hot
customer_reviews.text: This is my first chimney starter and i LOVE it. You would need to get BBQ Dragon Charcoal Starter and Fire Lighter for Barbecue Grills, Fire Pits, Camping, and Fireplaces - Battery-powered Bellows to go with it (also on Amazon). I do suggest Lighter cubes and a utility lighter. The cubes you can put in the middle of the tray, add charcoal and with the utility lighter it is easy to start then put the BBQ Dragon fan in and just wait a few mins. If you don't have the cubes you can use a paper towel with vegetable oil on it and then the charcoals.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Great experience and product at 8 months of use.
customer_reviews.text: With the fan, coals are typically ready 5-8 minutes. In the photo, we were starting a small amount for a brisket and with a sheet of newspaper in the metal elbow, the flames were shooting up in 3 minutes. I noticed it does not hold as much coal as my Webber chimney and also gets surface rust on it but after 8 months of use about 3-4 times a week, still love it and bring it on vacation and weekend camp trips. Note- you get lots of hot embers blowing up in the air so be cautious of your surroundings. I would not use it during a drought with dried grass/ vegetation around.
customer_reviews.author: Brett795

customer_reviews.title: Too Small
customer_reviews.text: This chimney starter might do well with charcoal briquettes but if you're using chunks of hardwood it's too small. I've set mine aside and returned to making a pyramid of the hardwood. I'll use it for cooking a couple of hamburgers. To me, it seems a bit of a gimmick.
customer_reviews.author: Han

customer_reviews.title: Wanted to love this chimney
customer_reviews.text: If you don't have the fan this chimney takes a lot more work to get going than a standard version. Still works, but not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: D. Atkinson

customer_reviews.title: On the first burn, it rusted imediately. Didn't think much of that but.....
customer_reviews.text: Now into the tenth use, it has rusted completely through the sides and I can now see holes in the sides. Fancy name but poor quality materials make this a "look elsewhere product." Hoped for much better.
customer_reviews.author: SPerthou

customer_reviews.title: I freaking LOVE this thing
customer_reviews.text: I freaking LOVE this thing! It's completely changed how I prep my coals. I used to use newspaper and a bunch of charcoal lighter fluid, but with this bad boy all I do now is dump the coals in, then place ain the black air inlet tube, light it, then walk away. It also gets the coals ready to go much faster. I'd love to try out the air blower they sell.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Utah

customer_reviews.title: I like the idea of a side-loading fuel pipe
customer_reviews.text: When received, the chimney was out of round. I was expecting a much thicker material that would not flex as much. I like the idea of a side-loading fuel pipe. Capacity seems smaller than other comparable chimneys. When compared to a Weber chimney, I am not sure the value is here. Still, you get a cool dragon on the side. Maybe BBQ dragon could create a small cutout in the shape of flames in front of the dragon's mouth that would glow when coals are lit.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: I thought the 'elbo' was a little gimickey and only useful for the dragon blower but it does really seem ...
customer_reviews.text: actually seems to work! I have 2 other chimneys 1 larger and 1 smaller and was looking for something in between so decided to try this dragon out.I thought the 'elbo' was a little gimickey and only useful for the dragon blower but it does really seem to work . This chimney gets roaring hot with flames above the coals after just a short while and i do not own the blower.Must really be 'insane' with the blower but the blower is a little pricey for something they advise to use for 'no more than 3 minutes'
customer_reviews.author: rjcbroomall

customer_reviews.title: Must better than the traditional chimneys.
customer_reviews.text: Finally got a chance to dry this out and I’m super happy with the outcome. I use lump charcoal, which is a little difficult to get lit sometimes. Unlike my other chimneys, which may take a couple of attempts, this chimney had my fire blazing in no time. Great product that I would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jkdmo

customer_reviews.title: Hot Charcoal - FAST
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, well built. When heaping full, all briquettes are completely started within 8-10 minutes when I use my BBQ Dragon at low speed. If the dragon is set on high, there's a little 'blow back' of sparks. It's not necessary to use high speed.... I positioned the Dragon 1/4" into the opening, set it at low speed & it works great... the Dragon stays cool as well....
customer_reviews.author: M Simpson

customer_reviews.title: Its smaller than a normal chimney starter. Since I ...
customer_reviews.text: Its smaller than a normal chimney starter. Since I didn't purchase the blower, YET, I would have to say it just works okay. Again, its smaller so it holds less charcoal.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: BBQ Dragon Fan is really required for this. Otherwise, just buy a different cheaper chimney.
customer_reviews.text: This is AMAZING with the BBQ dragon fan but not as a stand alone charcoal chimney. If you don't want to get the BBQ Dragon fan, skip this and get a regular charcoal chimney. With the BBQ dragon fan, this is the fastest way to get super hot hard wood charcoal lit in ~1-2min.
customer_reviews.author: John Naha

customer_reviews.title: Instant coals!
customer_reviews.text: This thing WORKS! I’ve been using charcoal chimneys and newspaper for years and years. I got this for my son-in-law for Christmas (he is also a chimney user), but we didn’t have a chance to try this out until the other day. Holy smokes! We had a chimneyful of ready-to-dump coals in about 3 minutes. Truly amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Nomadman

customer_reviews.title: Awesome! esp with bbq fan
customer_reviews.text: King of all chimneys!!! This paired with the bbq starter fan is just plain awesome. It will get coals rolling hot and ready in under 3 mins. Thanks to guga foods for the recommendation. Dont hesitate to buy - love the logo and hope to see a sear grate in the future
customer_reviews.author: Tressemee

customer_reviews.title: effective but poor quality
customer_reviews.text: This charcoal starter chimney works like no other I've ever used, and it never failed to start a fire on the first attempt. However, It didn't even last a full season, eventually crumbling into pieces. The cheapest charcoal chimney I've ever bought lasted longer than this one, and this one is not cheap. Bottom line: not worth the premium price.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Could not be more pleased
customer_reviews.text: I have tried a few charcoal chimneys over the years. Generally with unsatisfactory and at best inconsistent results. This one is completely different. It actually works as advertised every time. I have had great success placing a single Weber Lighter Cube in the 90 degree elbow. Could not be more pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Ole Yar

customer_reviews.title: Charcoal Chimney works well with BBQ Dragon
customer_reviews.text: This product works great with the BBQ Dragon. The chimney by itself is a little more flimsy than other chimneys I own, and is holds less charcoal. But the others don't work as well with the BBQ Dragon, so I'm happy with the purchase. If you just want a chimney (and not the BBQ Dragon) I'd try another product.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Southerland

customer_reviews.title: This thing burns up the coals too fast and it’s ...
customer_reviews.text: This thing burns up the coals too fast and it’s very rusty after only a couple uses. It does not hold enough charcoal. You have to use it twice for one session of grilling.
customer_reviews.author: Evan

customer_reviews.title: Need the fan to go with it!
customer_reviews.text: Along with the fan, this is the best chimney combo out there. I saw it on Guga foods and instantly ordered it. It saves a ton of time. I hope it lasts long, but based on its function, if I can get two years, I will consider it a success and replace it with no issues. BBQ enthusiasts, put it on your wish list.
customer_reviews.author: ozrugby

customer_reviews.title: Fast and powerful
customer_reviews.text: BBQ Dragon Chimney is really really handful. It takes me no efforts to light up my charcoal. What I really like is that the charcoal lights through all the superficial of it. I just arrange the direction of the air pipe with the wind and boom!! Tip: If you are in a rush don't put it on the floor as you might block additional air supply from the bottom of the chimney. I usually put it on the grill.
customer_reviews.author: Yokota

customer_reviews.title: Look it up on YouTube super cool
customer_reviews.text: Woah this thing is awesome! Takes a bit longer than expected to get to that "huge fire column" level, but everything gets heated evenly and burns significantly longer than traditional way. Also comes with included fanfare from friends/family when you show them your huge fire column. Hehe
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No.
customer_reviews.text: Instructions in GERMAN only. Also appears this is design to work with mainly with a auxiliary (not included) fan. I sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Gersabeck

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing. I would have never believed I could get charcoal started with a little bit of paper and one match; but did it over and over again while camping with this product. I just faced it into the wind and had hot charcoal in minutes. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Darcy C.

customer_reviews.title: Quality of BBQ Dragon
customer_reviews.text: The chimney is much heavier duty than my previous stainless steel chimney which after 5 or 6 years is falling apart. I also think the Dragon has slightly larger capacity - I will verify once I receive the battery operated fan. Should hold up well.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Glancy

customer_reviews.title: Makes starting charcoal fires a snap
customer_reviews.text: When coupled with the fan, this makes starting charcoal a breeze. I have a Weber charcoal chimney that works well but takes a long time to start, so if time is of the essence this is the way to go.
customer_reviews.author: Regina Collins

customer_reviews.title: Stick with Webber or something similar.
customer_reviews.text: More of a gimmick I think. Works like a chimney from Walmart that I’ve been using for years doesn’t start the charcoal any quicker. Looks cool though. I don’t have the fan so cannot comment on that.
customer_reviews.author: Chris I.

customer_reviews.title: The BBQ NUT
customer_reviews.text: Great product, makes you want to BBQ with your charcoal grill be cause it takes no time to light your coals and with out the use of lighter fluids. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Abraham M. Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Don't pick it up with out gloves.
customer_reviews.text: My reason behind getting it was that I wanted a chimney that was bigger than my weber, turns out the bbqdragon is smaller. I let them both from the bottom at the same time and some how the bigger weber with more coals was ready to be dumped on the grill first. The weber handle never has gotten hot enough to have to wear gloves..... Trying to pick up the bbqdragon will leave you with 2nd degree burns like myself. Weber is by far the better product and can be baught almost everywhere for lease.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip87

customer_reviews.title: His cc starter is very cool. The coolest feature is the vent pipe
customer_reviews.text: His cc starter is very cool. The coolest feature is the vent pipe. I use it to burn thru this pipe with a LPG torch for a few seconds only. After that, i place a battery driven small fan and after a few more seconds, the fire is already coming out on top. Very efficient! But after 2 months of usage it already starts to corrode and I see already the end of lifetime approaching. Therefore I wish the material could be stainless steel. But it's the best starter I've ever used!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Impressive!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great accessory for the BBQ Dragon fan! Easy to use and lights a lot of charcoal quickly. Once you use it a few times the finish corrodes and lightly rusts, but I use it to light charcoal, not as a showpiece.
customer_reviews.author: Honcho

customer_reviews.title: I purchased two of them!
customer_reviews.text: I like this product so much I purchased a second one to have when this one wears out. It hold a good amount of charcoal and I put two small lighter cubes in the chamber below and it lights the coals perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Gadget Girl

customer_reviews.title: Tough gadget to light the charcoal to turn white fast and save propane blow torch fuel
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Charcoal starter for charcoal bbq smoker. I tried to start the charcoal with blow torch, but this starter save my propane blow torch fuel by just lighting one and letting that ignite the rest of the charcoals. It routes the cold air up and I am satisfied with the result. It's weather proof and lives outside in the rain and snow.
customer_reviews.author: Parker Knight

customer_reviews.title: This thing works great
customer_reviews.text: This chimney works great with its fan counterpart it is not bad alone and works great makes grilling a bit more fun and easier in may ways
customer_reviews.author: Angiu

customer_reviews.title: Not the quality I was hoping for
customer_reviews.text: The metal cylinder is thinner/flimsier than I would like (and especially compared with Weber's chimneys). The construction was also somewhat rickety. It's also smaller than I would like. I think I'll stick with the Weber which is larger, stronger and better constructed
customer_reviews.author: Bambos

customer_reviews.title: Use one sheet of loosely compressed newspaper
customer_reviews.text: Works like a charm. Gave to new grandson in law for his new grill
customer_reviews.author: Judith Hood

customer_reviews.title: A must have for the charcoal enthusiast!
customer_reviews.text: I'm amazed that I didn't know about this product sooner. I haven't used gas to grill in 15 years. Charcoal is the only way! Sometimes I enjoy the wait, for the coals to get hot... But sometimes I need to hurry it up. This is what you need if you want to be grilling with charcoal in under 10 minutes!
customer_reviews.author: linezwork

customer_reviews.title: Totally Amazing Product !!
customer_reviews.text: The BBQ Dragon is as amazing as they say it is super fast and hot charcoal so much faster than anything else I’ve tried would totally recommend this to anyone that loves to grill !! Don’t forget the BBQ blower this is a great combo that no grilled should be without !! 2 thumbs up 👍👍
customer_reviews.author: Todd Crabtree

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy it.
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy it, takes to long to light the charcoal, I had to place paper under it to get it started and you shouldn't have to do that. You will be forced to buy the fan that goes with it or it won't work right. My cheaper version worked much better.

customer_reviews.title: Best charcoal chimney I have ever used
customer_reviews.text: Works great over the top of starter cubes. I tried putting in the tunnel but the battery powered bellow kept putting the cubes out, even on low. But using this in conjunction with the bellow I had flaming hot coals in 2 minutes 10 secs.
customer_reviews.author: Ice Water

customer_reviews.title: Every once in awhile a product comes along that changes ...
customer_reviews.text: Every once in awhile a product comes along that changes your life. This is one of those products. These guys took a clumsy device and turned it into a masterpiece. There is no other charcoal starter that works this well. I only needed one piece of newspaper from my Barron's to light all the coals.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Great with the fan attachment. You get to make Tim-the-toolman grunts as you use this thing around your friends. More power!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So much better than I have ever seen or used; be sure to get the Dragon Fan, too.
customer_reviews.text: Wow! Does this heat charcoal fast! I also purchased the Dragon fan and it's everything you could hope a charcoal chimney would be. It's lights the entire container to red hot within 15 or so minutes! Great product. I highly recommend this chimney, but be sure to get the Dragon fan that fits into the black starter chimney.
customer_reviews.author: David C. Diemer

customer_reviews.title: Happy but Impatiently waiting.
customer_reviews.text: I already had the BBQ Dragon blower. The chimney seems to work pretty good with the gas charcoal igniter on my Weber Performer. 5 minutes on the gas followed with the fan, 10-12 minutes total I'm grilling. Now for my only grievance, I was told the Rotating grill would be off backorder and available for purchase by now and its not. I want one of those.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for serious grillers!
customer_reviews.text: I am not sure what these haters of this product are talking about. Although it is smaller than the Weber, when used with the fan, it gets the coals lit 3x faster. I've used mine 6 times and have no problem with the quality of the item.
customer_reviews.author: Jason L.

customer_reviews.title: Happy husband
customer_reviews.text: My husband grills all the time and said he wished he had a chimney. So I got him the BBQ Dragon loved the price! He was very surprised (that I listened) and happy. Great meals to come!!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Zapata

customer_reviews.title: Best charcoal starter I have ever used!
customer_reviews.text: Fast and easy is correct about the BBQ Dragon! Other chimneys I have used in the past couldn't get the charcoal going without adding more starter materials to underneath the Chimney, but that problem has been solved with the BBQ Dragon. Feels very solidly made also compared to other charcoal starters, so I hope to get many years of use compared to my previous charcoal starters
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Great Chimney
customer_reviews.text: OMG this is a great chimney when paired with the blower everyone with a charcoal bbq should have one!
customer_reviews.author: Bigdad

customer_reviews.title: Total flop. It actually doesn't even make sense if ...
customer_reviews.text: Total flop. It actually doesn't even make sense if you are familiar with the triangle of fire. I live in the humid southeastern US and if it is above 55% humidity, this thing stalls and takes much longer to produce coals. It is also very small compared to other chimney starters on the market. I took mine to the shop and threw it in the metal recycling dumpster. Maybe it can be repurposed as a wind chime.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Oh, the insanity.......
customer_reviews.text: Love this. They've reinvented the chimney. I use a parafin cube to start the fire. No worries about wind as it's shielded inside the tube. Combine it with the BBQ dragon and you'll have 100% ready coals in 15min.
customer_reviews.author: M. Button

customer_reviews.title: GREAT for smoking on charcoal
customer_reviews.text: Buy the whole set up, lighter cubes and all. GREAT for smoking on charcoal, especially when your temp is running low and you need to bring it up in a hurry.
customer_reviews.author: Blade Bandit

customer_reviews.title: Gimmick that is no faster than any other.
customer_reviews.text: The air intake tube takes a lot of room in the bottom. This reduces the amount of newspaper you can put in the bottom and results in an uneven start. It does work, but it’s no faster at starting your charcoal. The added cost is not justified.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Frank

customer_reviews.title: V nice
customer_reviews.text: V nice but it doesn’t come with a fire starter u will need to buy that separately,in truth it’s the reason I haven’t used it yet but I have seen and used my friends so it’s the same thing,I will be buying that fire starter soon though.
customer_reviews.author: Nad

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: IT WAS EXACTLY WHAT WE ANTICIPATED AN OF GREAT QUALITY
customer_reviews.author: Laurie

customer_reviews.title: Amazing when used with a fan
customer_reviews.text: The Chimney is nothing special by itself, however, when paired with the Dragon fan its amazing! You will have blazing hot charcoal in 3-5 minutes as compared to 10-15 in a traditional chimney. Its an amazing product!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly fast with the fan!
customer_reviews.text: I like how fast you can get the charcoal ready to cook when you combine the chimney of insanity with the barbecue dragon blower fan. The biggest downside is the cost of the both of them together (which is why I only give it 4 stars fo value for the money- the quality is very good)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: The volume it can accommodate is very reasonable for a small family BBQ, even if you have to use it twice the time is still short. You can grab the handle without gloves and it is not even warm to touch
customer_reviews.author: issam

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: Nice product. It gets the coals blazing hot and ready to go. I haven't bought the dragon blower yet, just used an old hair dryer. Worked like a charm. I can't believe that I haven't been using this all along!
customer_reviews.author: Baker

customer_reviews.title: awesome chimney starter
customer_reviews.text: this chimney starter works great and add it to my BBQ dragon and the fire sure gets started quickly
customer_reviews.author: Jeff L

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent in LOOKS, CONSTRUCTION and EFFICACY. Considering for bbq’ing-cooking offspring.
customer_reviews.author: Cajun Rosa

customer_reviews.title: Awesome customer service
customer_reviews.text: Chimney was purchased for a gift, but seems really impressive. Received a dented item and company immediately sent me a new one. So impressed with the customer service! Product label is in a foreign language, which will take some explaining to the gift recipient, but I can deal with that.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Menke

customer_reviews.title: Perfection
customer_reviews.text: This chimney is the best I've used. It is high quality and worked very quickly. No more waiting to grill and no more charcoal fluid. Within a few minutes, we were able to use our charcoal grill again and the food tastes amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Raeann E.

customer_reviews.title: aren't inclined to "life hack" a steel coffee container or the like, then by all means
customer_reviews.text: yes its just a charcoal starter and you can use lots of stuff for the purpose but if you don't have one, aren't inclined to "life hack" a steel coffee container or the like, then by all means, pony up a couple bucks for this one and you won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: southerndrew

customer_reviews.title: Buy this
customer_reviews.text: Works pretty well. I also purchased the blower to go with it. My charcoal was ready in about 10 minutes. I'm very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Blair Bashore

customer_reviews.title: Never use a fire starter or worse lighter fuel again
customer_reviews.text: Never use a fire starter or worse lighter fuel again. Load your lump coal or brickets, place a pice of crumpled newspaper ( with a little cooking oil on it ) under the chimney, light and let the insanity begin. Works so well it's mental! ~ c
customer_reviews.author: Carlo

customer_reviews.title: BBQ Dragon
customer_reviews.text: By far the best chimney I have ever used. Bought with the BBQ Dragon the bellows along with BBQ Dragon Dragon eggs fire starter. Was ready to grill in about 7 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Davidwlondon

customer_reviews.title: Oh yeh!. Get the blower attachment that hooks ...
customer_reviews.text: Oh yeh!. Get the blower attachment that hooks up to this. You can get a load of hardwood charcoal blazing faster than you thought possible.
customer_reviews.author: stafford

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product. The tubing creates a jet effect that accelerates the ignition of coals. Pair this with the BBQ dragon and you’ll have red hot coals in less than 5 min. You can also use a blow dryer, but it is not recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Mark P Sideno

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: BBQ Dragon is simply the best out there. Quick and efficient when used with the BBQ Grill lighter
customer_reviews.author: cmcase

customer_reviews.title: Cuts prep time by more than half
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely love the results. This cuts major time off our charcoal prep and is very easy to use. Really great grilling investment.
customer_reviews.author: cole holloway

customer_reviews.title: Hott Stuff
customer_reviews.text: Works great I just wish it was a little bit larger.
customer_reviews.author: J. McCoy

customer_reviews.title: Fire
customer_reviews.text: I love it! I makes it so easy to light your coals
customer_reviews.author: jason c usery

customer_reviews.title: It is a great product and best chimney I have ever owned
customer_reviews.text: It is just as described. It is a great product and best chimney I have ever owned. It heats the coals faster than other chimneys. I would recommend this chimney over any other chimney.
customer_reviews.author: EB

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my brother, he loves it. I still want to get the fan that works in conjunction. Great product
customer_reviews.author: R. anderson

customer_reviews.title: Get it with the fan!
customer_reviews.text: Get this with the BBQ dragon fan. 1000% more effective.
customer_reviews.author: Kris Hinds

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: It shipped quick, item was as described and works great. Would definitely order again.
customer_reviews.author: David Martinez

customer_reviews.title: This is the best thing to start your fire in a smoker
customer_reviews.text: This is the best thing to start your fire in a smoker. Use to take 30 minutes to start, now 10-15 minutes. And an even fire 🔥 starts. Great product. I recommend!
customer_reviews.author: brenda silverman

customer_reviews.title: Long live the dragon
customer_reviews.text: This thing makes you feel more like a man. Whenever I just need to improve my overall manliness I just pull out the dragon and bask in its glory.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Grindley

customer_reviews.title: My husband loves it
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my husband who loves to grill all the time. The first time he used this was to start the coals to smoke a turkey. Let's just say this was a huge hit and helped him get the coals ready quickly.
customer_reviews.author: connie brote

customer_reviews.title: Feels good, received bad
customer_reviews.text: Received product damaged. Looks like it would be a great product. Feels sturdy but couldn't handle the shipping

customer_reviews.title: Great with the Dragon starter. Not really a standalone product.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent company to the dragon starter. I only wish it held a bit more charcoal as it’s not quite as big as the Weber chimney starter.

customer_reviews.title: Just awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: Easiest way to start your charcoal!! Highly recommend this for any bbq’er.

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Superb. I really like it the materials are made of great quality.I love it.

customer_reviews.text: This is the quickest, most efficient and cleanest way to light charcoal for the grill. Whoever thought of this idea is a genius!

customer_reviews.title: Air flow
customer_reviews.text: Love this! The hole funnel directs the air to start your fire faster.

customer_reviews.title: Nice design, good concept but made flimsy and should ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice design, good concept but made flimsy and should have used thicker gauge metal for the construction. Mine arrived dented.
customer_reviews.author: Dmitriy Grishchuk

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work at all
customer_reviews.text: Didn't work at all. Couldn't get the charcoal lit. Even with the dragon fan. We went back to our original chimney starter.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Williams

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Works extremely well although not sure why it would cost 2x more than other relay chimneys. I used a hair dryer instead of the branded fan and it works beautifully
customer_reviews.author: John Kim

product_meta.title: BBQ Dragon Chimney of Insanity Charcoal Starter - The Fastest and Easiest Charcoal Chimney Starter for BBQ Grills
feature_bullets: Fast and Easy to Operate- The Innovative design allow coals to be lit in as little as three minute.
90 Degree Elbow- Open at the side of chimney, Turbo effect and draw more air than any other chimney.
Unique Side Hole- It allows lighting your coal without lifting the chimney or using lighter fluid.
Durable - Made by thick gauge galvanized steel with thick heat shield & heat resistant nylon handle.
For Optimum Performance - Use with Bbq Dragon fan,which turns it into insane charcoal blast furnace!
